scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:api
scripts.build:api: cd api && python3 -m venv .venv && . .venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.setup:api: cd api && python3 -m venv .venv && . .venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.start:api: cd api && (test -d .venv || (python3 -m venv .venv && . .venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt)) && . .venv/bin/activate && uvicorn app.main:app --reload --port 3000
scripts.test: concurrently "cd api && (test -d .venv || npm run setup:api) && . .venv/bin/activate && pytest" "npm run test --workspace=frontend"
scripts.test:api: cd api && (test -d .venv || npm run setup:api) && . .venv/bin/activate && pytest
